description: Agent connectivity and heartbeat events. Generated when the Falcon sensor comes online or reports status. Used for calculating system uptime, boot time, and sensor health monitoring.

columns.name: aid
columns.description: Agent ID - unique identifier for the endpoint

columns.name: cid
columns.description: Customer ID - unique identifier for the CrowdStrike tenant

columns.name: BaseTime
columns.description: Base time value used for calculating system boot time (Windows-specific)

common_operations: Windows boot time calculation using BaseTime
System uptime calculation (time since last reboot)

calculation_formulas.Usage: Used with selectLast([BaseTime]) to get most recent boot time per endpoint

notes: BaseTime requires conversion formula to get actual boot timestamp on Windows. The formula accounts for Falcon's internal time representation.
